HTMLSnippet.DataSource: Select recLName from oldtowndining.tblRecipes where RecipeId = @rec_id

DataTable.DataSource:
select rid.RecipeID, 'I' as ItemType, rid.IngID as ID, rid.RecAmount as Amount, u.UnitName as Unit, ic.RecipePrintOrder as ListOrder, i.IngLName as Ingredient, rid.RecQual as Preparation
from oldtowndining.tblRecipeIngDet rid inner join oldtowndining.tblIngredients i on rid.IngID = i.IngID inner join oldtowndining.tblUnits u on rid.UnitID = u.UnitID inner join oldtowndining.tblIngredientCategories ic on ic.IngCatID = i.IngCatID
where RecipeID = @rec_id
union
select rrd.RecRecipeID, 'R' as ItemType, rrd.RecipeParentID as ID, rrd.RecRecAmount, u.UnitName, 2 as ListOrder, r.RecLName + '*',
rrd.RecRecQual from oldtowndining.tblRecipeRecDet rrd inner join oldtowndining.tblRecipes r on rrd.RecipeID = r.RecipeID inner join oldtowndining.tblUnits u on r.RecPort = u.UnitID
where rrd.RecipeParentID = @rec_id
order by ItemType, ListOrder, Ingredient
